name: Shikanoin Heizou
desc:
Upcoming Card

This information is based on the Creator Experience Version, and all its content is still under development. Please refer to the official version for the finalized content.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
<color=#ffffff>Prepare Skill</color> <color=#ffffffa6>:</color> <color=#ffffff>Heartstopper Strike: Charge</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Heartstopper Strike: Charge</color>
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Deals 4</color> <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> <color=#ffffffa6>.</color>

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Deals 4</color> <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> <color=#ffffffa6>. If this Skill triggers</color> <color=#80ffd7>Anemo-Related Reactions</color> <color=#ffffffa6>, attach a</color> <color=#ffffff>Windmuster Iris</color> <color=#ffffffa6>of the corresponding element to the opponent's active character.</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Windmuster Iris</color>
<color=#ffd780>Effect</color>
<color=#ffffff>Before the side of the field that this card is on chooses their action:</color> <color=#ffffffa6>Deal 1 corresponding type of Elemental DMG to the attached character.</color>

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>(Passive)</color> <color=#ffffff>After you trigger</color> <color=#80ffd7>Anemo-Related Reactions</color> <color=#ffffff>:</color> <color=#ffffffa6>Attach 1 stack of</color> <color=#ffffff>Declension</color> <color=#ffffffa6>to self.</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Declension</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>If this state has 2 stacks, then consume 2 stacks of this state, and the next</color> <color=#ffffff>Heartstopper Strike</color> <color=#ffffffa6>this character performs will be considered a Fast Action, while DMG for this</color> <color=#ffffff>Heartstopper Strike: Charge</color> <color=#ffffffa6>will be increased by 1. (Can stack, no limit)</color>

Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Cryo Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Cryo DMG to all opposing chracters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Hydro Swirl:</color> Deals 1 Hydro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Pyro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Pyro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Electro DMG to all opposing characters except the target

<color=#ece5d8>Prepare Skill</color>
Some Skills cannot be used directly. Instead, they need to be <color=#ffffff>prepared</color> over a certain number of turns.
When it is a certain player's turn, and this player's active character is currently <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> a Skill, this player's turn will be skipped. If the Skill has finished being <color=#ffffff>prepared</color> , the character will directly use that Skill at this time. (Skills that require <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> cannot activate effects triggered by "using a Skill" or "triggering an Elemental Reaction" or other such effects.)
Only active characters can <color=#ffffff>prepare</color> Skills, and if an active character who is <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> a Skill gets switched off-field, their <color=#ffffff>preparation</color> will be interrupted.
<color=#80ffd7>Anemo-Related Reactions</color>
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Cryo Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Cryo DMG to all opposing chracters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Hydro Swirl:</color> Deals 1 Hydro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Pyro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Pyro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Electro DMG to all opposing characters except the target

value.name: Shikanoin Heizou
value.desc: A young prodigy detective from the Tenryou Commission. His senses are sharp and his thoughts are clear.
